title: Copy-paste does not work properly with texts. Copying text in multi-task and pasting it don't work.
content:
Google pixel 3 
Android 11
Russian language copying from multi-task are now broken on my phone, it worked properly a day ago. I tried factory reset, tried to find options, information, could not find any answers or information why it is now disabled? Also I got issue with disappearing weather on home screen, It happens all the time even before the copy-pasting broke.
Here is the examples - 
Я люблю Гугл пиксель 3!
Tyrn nuKceNb 3!
